post.name: David St.John
post.comments: I knew Clint over the last four years. Clint was a friend that you could talk to anytime and he would make time for you. We had a lot of good laughs and a lot of great conversations. I was aware when Clint got sick and the hardships he went through but even then he never seemed to be in a bad mood. I was really sorry to hear of his passing. Clint, I will miss my friend.
